title: What are some classic books on economics and political economy? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think that for someone who would like to get general idea about economics or political economy best idea is to use a textbook. Textbooks are boring but you get biggest bang for your buck. So stick with the textbook. Than once you get general idea about economics and political economy than you can read specific areas that you think are interesting.
